title: We Played Hitman 2! - Kinda Funny Games Impressions E3 2018
description:
Nick got to play Hitman at E3 2018!

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/

transcript_chunks.text: hey what's up guys it's me and Nik here on the show floor at e3 2018 here in Los Angeles Nick got to play the new hitman game from Warner Brothers games WB Nick what did you think about him it's more hitman yeah so if you liked the last iteration of hitman the episodic released hitman it's the exact same game it's just more of it more stories more crazy wacky ways to kill people I played the demo that you saw basically from the trailer where you're at the Raceway it was in Florida and with where land Mickey Rourke clubs oh yeah basically whiplash comes up yeah Shh no but you point obviously as age of 47 you go there's multiple ways to kill your target you have two targets but I only got to kill one of them which was a Ciaran on Sayle oh dude I know well they didn't let me they were like you're so good at this game oh you've gotta just relax tone it down yeah yeah but you know obviously there's different ways to do it you saw in the trailer or you know you can sniper or you can blow up

so good at this game oh you've gotta just relax tone it down yeah yeah but you know obviously there's different ways to do it you saw in the trailer or you know you can sniper or you can blow up the car you can blow up on podiums I chose this night because I like the long range I like to be safe yeah yeah relax yeah and serving that drink cup of coffee BAM did you have all those condiments around you I know none of them were available in the game it's only really critique of it well you know it's fun it's it's standard hitman fare right there's multiple ways tackle it however you want oh you're taking people out your dressing is a dress as a mascot I you know found a crowbar open up a gate and grab a sniper rifle killed a couple security guard you killed the mascot - oh and then didn't kill him I just choked him out but I mean this is the problem which I can do a lot is you don't there's a fine line between they're gonna be unconscious for a while or I may have just ended your life
